snippet.title: Last Days of Lazarus - Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
🔴  Last Days of Lazarus will be arriving on Steam on June 22nd 2022!

Join Lazarus in his quest to reconnect with his sister and to find out more about his family, all while unexplainable events and political turmoil surround him. Meet questionable characters and explore both oppressive and eerily beautiful locations inspired by post communist Romania. Delve deep into the story through letters, documents and hidden collectibles. Solve intuitive puzzles to progress or unlock optional insights into this disturbed family's story.

🎮 Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1359920/Last_Days_of_Lazarus/
________________________
Follow us on twitter for more updates:
https://twitter.com/GrimTalin
https://twitter.com/darkaniaworks
